medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The patient initially presented at another hospital a year prior with dyspnoea and haemoptysis. At the current presentation, he complained of chest pain, haemoptysis, and dyspnoea. He discontinued Rivaroxaban after seven months which he was started on for unprovoked pulmonary embolism.
medical_history.past_medical_history: History of unprovoked pulmonary embolism; discontinued Rivaroxaban after seven months.
